channel.title: Official Server PvP - ReVote
channel.description:
This thread is to discuss opinions on how PvP is right now, and possible changes that could be made.
If PvP is removed, it will actually be replaced with a plugin that still allows PvP to be enabled if people want.

item.title: Official Server PvP - ReVote
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:77, topic:380473”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=476302.msg3485136#msg3485136 date=1296497106]
so pvp will be replaced with plugin now right, not like prev time
[/quote]Yes, with the plugin I am writing. There is a topic for it :)[/quote]yeh Ive read it, it sounds awesome

EDIT: and again we voted, and again nothing happens

Read full topic

item.title: Official Server PvP - ReVote
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

We should have PVP but only to people who are willing, you have to ask someone to fight, not just blast them.

item.title: Official Server PvP - ReVote
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:61, topic:380473”]What I was saying is does anyone have a problem with admins spawning items for the spawn to be made with? I wouldn’t think anyone would.

Also, I’m sure we could use help building it. I know at least Corey builds awesome stuff (like the varrock bar). I pretty much stick with building boring square buildings with no furnishings at all… :/[/quote]

i can help build i build cool stuff

Read full topic

item.title: Official Server PvP - ReVote
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

krackkid:

Haven is already left with no one, varrock has no one, camelot has no one, there are loads of buildings/places with no one. When people know there is gonna be a safe non pvp area, most will move there.

The only safe non pvp area should be the spawn, and they won’t be able to build there. Just use it’s facilities.

Read full topic

item.title: Official Server PvP - ReVote
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:70, topic:380473”]Varrock and Camelot are gone as far as I know.

I made a thread detailing what the changes to PvP will be, it should work fine with castles and kingdoms. I don’t think we will ever fully remove PvP.[/quote]

Varrock is gone but it’s still standing. It’s an ancient city that can be populated at any time. But no one will populate it so long as PVP doesn’t give them the security they’d like and what I had based Varrock around.

Read full topic

item.title: Official Server PvP - ReVote
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:67, topic:380473”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=476302.msg3484552#msg3484552 date=1296439405]
I think the admins and VIPs already have their own homes etc. This should be just a nice, tiny town for people to get started in.
[/quote]Mopar I honestly think if the pvp gets removed there should be a fresh new map. Mainly because of everyones base will be moved and it will just be a waste. All the mines will have no use anymore, etc, etc.[/quote]
Wait, why would bases be moved?

And let’s please not change PvP

Read full topic

item.title: Official Server PvP - ReVote
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

What I was saying is does anyone have a problem with admins spawning items for the spawn to be made with? I wouldn’t think anyone would.

Also, I’m sure we could use help building it. I know at least Corey builds awesome stuff (like the varrock bar). I pretty much stick with building boring square buildings with no furnishings at all…

Read full topic

item.title: Official Server PvP - ReVote
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Moparisthebest:

@Corey, on this server admins don’t spawn things, but I don’t see why we couldn’t spawn blocks to build a communal town at the spawn area that couldn’t be destroyed. I’m sure everyone would agree to that, and the community could help build it as well.

I know server admins don’t spawn things. But I do know that the spawn area was made through spawned items. Which is what I was aiming at.

Read full topic

item.title: Official Server PvP - ReVote
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:58, topic:380473”]@Corey, on this server admins don’t spawn things, but I don’t see why we couldn’t spawn blocks to build a communal town at the spawn area that couldn’t be destroyed. I’m sure everyone would agree to that, and the community could help build it as well.[/quote]That’s the basic idea I had when building the main spawn area, I just didn’t know if people would get angry at me for making a larger area. I think it’s a good idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Official Server PvP - ReVote
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

There is this one game I use to play…

They had castle wars on the weekend, the person who won the castle had special bonuses during the week.(I.E more damage). It worked fine people had the week to grind and prepare and there was no complaints.

Read full topic

item.title: Official Server PvP - ReVote
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:54, topic:380473”]PVP days.
Weekdays = Non-PVP
Weekends (when people have the time to be online for extended hours) = PVP.

This adds to the preparation aspect of building. You have a week to rebuild what you’ve lost from a raid. Then on the weekend, those who have set up wars, can.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Official Server PvP - ReVote
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:54, topic:380473”]PVP days.
Weekdays = Non-PVP
Weekends (when people have the time to be online for extended hours) = PVP.

This adds to the preparation aspect of building. You have a week to rebuild what you’ve lost from a raid. Then on the weekend, those who have set up wars, can.[/quote]

Yea, that actually sounds like a good idea. Although ALOT more raids would be happening on weekends.

Read full topic

item.title: Official Server PvP - ReVote
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

PVP days.
Weekdays = Non-PVP
Weekends (when people have the time to be online for extended hours) = PVP.

This adds to the preparation aspect of building. You have a week to rebuild what you’ve lost from a raid. Then on the weekend, those who have set up wars, can.
